definition: To make something less dangerous or harmful, typically referring to the removal or deactivation of a potentially explosive or hazardous object.

examples.german: Experten wurden gerufen, um die Situation zu entschärfen.
examples.english: Experts were called to defuse the situation.

examples.german: Der Polizist entschärfte den Konflikt zwischen den Streithähnen.
examples.english: The police officer defused the conflict between the quarrelers.

examples.german: Um Verletzungen zu vermeiden, musste der Sprengsatz entschärft werden.
examples.english: To avoid injuries, the explosive device had to be defused.

examples.german: Die Feuerwehrleute entschärften die gefährliche Chemikalie.
examples.english: The firefighters defused the dangerous chemical.
